info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 8:28AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 or more inches is possible in the most persistent snow bands. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel due to snow covered and slippery roads and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow amounts are expected to occur north of Route 28. Snow rates in excess of 1 inch per hour will be possible. The snowband is expected to drop southward for a time Sunday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
